# LEaP file generated by PLMD script
[FORCEFIELDS]

# Import structures
[STRUCTURES_IMPORT]
   
# Save no water files
savepdb compound [FOLDER]/pdb-files/finalLEaP_nowat.pdb
saveamberparm compound [FOLDER]/md-files/peptide_nowat.prmtop [FOLDER]/md-files/peptide_nowat.inpcrd

# Solvate & save again
solvatebox compound TIP3PBOX [WATERBOXSIZE]
savepdb compound [FOLDER]/pdb-files/finalLEaP.pdb
saveamberparm compound [FOLDER]/md-files/peptide.prmtop [FOLDER]/md-files/peptide.inpcrd
